BIgDig_Main_WonderWhatWellFind.content: Hm, I wonder what we'll find this time.

BigDig_Collection_CheckOutFossils.content: Whoa, check out all the fossils!

BigDig_Collection_Fetch.content: Oh, oh oh I'll get it!

BigDig_Collection_FossilTap.content: Tap on the fossils to check them out.

BigDig_Collection_FossilsClick.content: Click on the fossils to check them out.

BigDig_Collection_HaventFoundAnything.content: Hm. Guess we haven't found anything yet.

BigDig_Collection_LoveMyToys.content: Oh, I just love my toys. I sure do.

BigDig_Collection_ToyWelcome.content: Oh look at all the toys we've found!
Hey, you want to play with my toys? I love to share.

BigDig_Collection_Welcome.content: It's bigger than it looks from outside, huh?
Everything we dig up is kept in here, so take a look around!

BigDig_Main_CheckOutStuff.content: If you want to check out the stuff we've dug up, it's in my doggie house!

BigDig_Main_CollectionClick.content: Click here to look at our collection!

BigDig_Main_CollectionTap.content: Tap here to look at our collection!

BigDig_Main_FoundCoolThings.content: Yes! You found so many cool things! You want to check them out?

BigDig_Main_Intro.content: I bury all kinds of stuff out here.
But sometimes, or many times, or always... I forget where I put them.
Hey! You could help me dig up all kinds of cool stuff in the yard.

BigDig_Main_TimeToGoDigging.content: Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy! Time to go digging!

BigDig_Main_WelcomeBack.content: You want to dig some more?

BigDig_Result_BestTreasureFinder.content: Oh look at all the stuff! You're like...
the best treasure finder of all time!

BigDig_Result_MightyFine.content: Yay you! That is some mighty fine digging.

BigDig_Result_Wow.content: Wow, check out what we found!

Hal_FossilView_BuiltDino.content: Oh wow, you did it! You built the dinosaur!

Hal_FossilView_ClickPiece.content: Just click on the fossil piece and move it to the dinosaur to match the shape.

Hal_FossilView_HaventFound.content: Uh, we haven't found that fossil yet. Still looking.

Hal_FossilView_NewFossil.content: Hey, let's try and put them together to build this dinosaur!

Hal_FossilView_TapPiece.content: Tap on a fossil piece and drag it over to the dinosaur to match the shape!

Hal_Game_BottomNewSpot.content: That's the bottom, pick a new spot!

Hal_Game_DigOtherUncover.content: Dig up other squares to uncover it.

Hal_Game_FoundToy.content: Keep going, we need to find the fossil.

Hal_Game_FoundToy2.content: My toy! I'll play with you later little buddy. Got to keep digging to find that fossil.

Hal_Game_ImBack.content: Phew! Sorry, heh heh. I'm back.

Hal_Game_PartFossil.content: Oh! That's part of a fossil!

Hal_Tutorial_OneClick.content: You only need to click once to dig through it.

Hal_Tutorial_OneFossil.content: Each round has one fossil to find.
You've got to dig it up before we get to the next round.

Hal_Tutorial_OneTap.content: You only need to tap once to dig through it.

Hal_Tutorial_PlacesToDig.content: All these squares are all the places we can dig.

Hal_Tutorial_ScaryThings.content: Oh and watch out for creepy crawly things. Bleh.
I can't help you dig when I see them!

Hal_Tutorial_ShowYou.content: Okay. Before we start digging, let me show you how it's done!

Hal_Tutorial_SomeSoft.content: Some squares are really soft and easy to dig through, like this soil!

Hal_Tutorial_Timer.content: We've got to move fast because once the time runs out, it's no more digging.

Hal_Tutorial_ToughSpot.content: Other spots are tougher, like rocks.
They'll take longer to break through them.

Hal_Tutorial_Toys.content: Sometimes you'll find my doggie toys that I've lost.
Then we can add them to our collection.

Hal_Tutorial_WhenFossil.content: When you think you see a fossil, dig up more spots to uncover the whole thing!

BigDig_Tutorial_Grass.content: Grass takes two digs to get to the bottom!

BigDig_Tutorial_Hint.content: Oooh, this magnifying glass will give you a hint where the fossil is.

BigDig_Tutorial_Pickaxe.content: A pickaxe will dig one square all the way to the bottom!

BigDig_Tutorial_Rocks.content: Spots with rocks are tougher. It takes longer to break through 'em.

BigDig_Tutorial_Shockwave.content: This will dig all the squares down one level!

BigDig_Tutorial_Shovel.content: A shovel will dig a bunch of tiles down to the bottom!

BigDig_Tutorial_Vole.content: This little guy will dig out a row of squares for you!
